nodes.text: A battle at the planet Borleias occurred in 10 ABY.

This battle took part of the offensive planned by reborn Emperor Palpatine against the New Republic to reconquer the Core Worlds. Those assaults were executed by the reunified Imperial warlords and loyal Imperial forces prior to the launch of Operation Shadow Hand.
After the conquest of the Northern Dependencies by Grand Moff Ardus Kaine and the conquest of the Core Worlds by Superior General Sander Delvardus, the two fleets reunited to attack Borleias.
This battle makes its unique appearance in The Essential Atlas. The battle is only illustrated on the galactic map of the conflict.
